name: Glacis Noir Lookout: Stars Beneath Leaves
riddle: Sometimes the ground is the sky.

renderSpec.prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card of 5 constellations, 2 lamps, 1 tortoise shell mirror.. canopy_starlight_mystical_reflection with dappled_starlight_through_leaves_texture. Dense foliage, rhythmic Seychellois motifs, saturated greens/blues/yellows. background_stars_midground_canopy_foreground_mirror. Fine copperplate hatching, visible brush strokes, textured overlays. Cultural stamps: star_navigation, tortoise_shell_crafts. Volumetric depth, painterly effects, living busy scene. Etched-map caption strip with gold title. 17th-century nautical chart + Seychellois modernist painting, ritualistic archaeological mood.
